channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China Revisits Its War With Japan, Stirring Pride and Fears of Hatred
item.description: A series of World War II dramas about China’s fight against Japan is drawing audiences to their feet, and, in some cases, to tears. Some say it helps ...

item.title: The ‘Economic Storm’ of Crises That Is Battering Afghanistan
item.description: Afghanistan was on a timid recovery path. But four years after the Taliban retook power, it has been badly hit by aid cuts and an inflow of two millio...

item.title: London’s Peace Monk Chants, Drums and Walks to Urge an End to War
item.description: For 40 years, the Rev. Gyoro Nagase has overseen a temple to peace in a popular park in Battersea, his ever-present drum by his side.

item.title: ‘Gender ideology’ has no place in sex ed, Trump White House says
item.description: “Federal funds will not be used to poison the minds of the next generation or advance dangerous ideological agendas," said Andrew Gradison of the HHS.

item.title: Trump’s reciprocal tariffs are struck down by federal appeals court, putting trade deals and huge revenue windfall at risk
item.description: The 7-4 ruling won't take effect until Oct. 14, as the court sought to give the Trump administration time to appeal to the Supreme Court.

item.title: Elon Musk’s lawyer Alex Spiro set to chair $200 million Dogecoin treasury company, say sources
item.description: Investors are receiving pitches for a Dogecoin treasury company to invest in the token, according to six sources.
